description.brief: Source for the WGE100 Ethernet camera

package.description: Source for the WGE100 Ethernet camera: Verilog source for the FPGA, Forth source for the camera firmware. Intended for camera developers. Note that a built binary from this package is checked in under wge100_camera/firmware_images/
package.author: James Bowman, Blaise Gassend. MAC by Jared Casper and Morgan Quigley
